name: Where's Grandpa?
description:
Global Game Jam 2021 project
It's grandpa's 90th birthday today and he's gone missing! It's up to you (his favorite grandson) to track him down in time for his boisterous birthday bash. Call around town, meet his wild band of friends, and learn more about his zany adventures as you solve the mystery of his disappearance.

Team:
